query.currentGamePhase: SELECT * FROM spq_risk_game_phase_name PN JOIN spq_risk_game_phase GP ON (GP.ID_GAME_PHASE = PN.ID_PHASE) WHERE GP.ID_GAME = :id_game
query.currentGameUserPhase: SELECT * FROM spq_risk_game_turn_phase TP JOIN spq_risk_user UU ON (UU.ID_USER = TP.ID_USER) WHERE TP.ID_GAME = :id_game
query.allGameUser: SELECT UU.* FROM spq_risk_user UU JOIN spq_risk_game_user UD on (UD.ID_USER = UU.ID_USER)
query.insert: INSERT INTO spq_risk_game (GAME_NAME, GAME_CREATION_DATE, GAME_MAX_POINT, ID_LANG) VALUES ( :game_name, :game_creation_date, :game_max_point, :id_lang )
query.updateGameTurn: UPDATE spq_risk_game SET id_user_current_turn = :id_user_current_turn, game_turn_number = :game_turn_number WHERE id_game = :id_game
query.endGame: UPDATE spq_risk_game SET id_user_winner = :id_user_winner, game_end_date = :game_end_date WHERE id_game = :id_game
